name: Shooting Critical Strike
description:
In Shooting Critical Strike you are going to experience completely new counter terror battle field environment feel & amazing graphics & sound effects. This is all about secret missions and you are leading the operations. It’s all in your hands to end up the crime in this best shooting game.

Shooting Critical Strike you are equipped with modern cover shoot guns. You must take cover to keep yourself safe and keep an eye on terrorist through aim, if you lose your concentration Enemies take advantage and shoot you due to which you can't Survive and mission will be failed. Keep in mind, the missions are not easy, you have to show your best cover shooting skills during killing the terrorists.

Features :
Uniquely designed Thrilling Missions
Amazing military weapons with best controls
Localization
Realistic effects with AAA graphics
In App Purchases
Variety of Guns
High Quality 3D environment
